Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: 3 red lights in a triangular arrangement
divs: Sighting Detailsi was up late,listening to music on my headphones. as i was readying for bed , i noticed out the west window 3 red lights(triangle) that appeared to not be moving.since we lived adjacent to burl. co. airpark,lights in the sky were no biggie because they were always airplanes.BUT there was no sound of an engine or anything and the lights were stationary and did not appear to be moving.after watching for about 3 minutes or so the lights began to move toward the south,and disapeared out of the west window only to reappear in the south facing window a few seconds later.the lights continued to move now seemingly upward and over the house only to reappear in the west window again.it remained there for maybe a minute or so and suddenly veered southward at incredible speed.and dissapeared.i was so scared i could not talk.even tho my brother and i shared the same room.it took about 20 minutes before i was able to find my voice and call out to him to wake up.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Lumberton
There were no other sightings in Lumberton on or around October 12th 1979
